structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.catch_line: Authority of fiscal court to regulate construction of buildings.
law.text: The fiscal court of any county shall have authority, by order or resolution, to adopt, and to enforce, regulations governing construction as defined by KRS 198B.010 pursuant to the provisions of KRS 198B.060.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 44, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 57, effective August 31, 1979. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 70, sec. 1.
